org.linkset
Class SimpleEventBus

java.lang.Object
  org.linkset.SimpleEventBus
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventBus
public final class SimpleEventBus
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventBus

A simple single threaded implementation that allows only exact type event matchng.

Author:
Lukasz Bownik (lukasz.bownik@gmail.com)
